mapper.select: select boxtotalnum/plan_amount as plan_amount,wo_no,wo_start_time from wms_gdxd_in_just where to_char(wo_start_time,'mm.dd') = #{date}
select * from wms_gdxd_in_just where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}

select batch_no,floor(((to_date(to_char(cast(wo_end_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(to_char(cast(wo_start_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) *24*60)) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_in_just where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}
select * from wms_gdxd_in_just where wo_no = #{woNo}
select * from wms_gdxd_in where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}
select * from wms_gdxd_in where wo_no = #{woNo}
select boxtotalnum/plan_amount as plan_amount,wo_no,wo_start_time from wms_gdxd_in where to_char(wo_start_time,'mm.dd') = #{date}

select batch_no,floor(((to_date(to_char(cast(wo_end_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(to_char(cast(wo_start_time as date),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) *24*60)) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_in where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm.dd') = #{date}
select in_line from wms_gdxd_in group by in_line
select * from wms_gdxd_in where in_line = #{inLine}
select team_cd from(select trim(team_cd) as team_cd from wms_gdxd_in group by team_cd) group by team_cd
select team_cd from wms_gdxd_in group by team_cd
select * from wms_gdxd_in where trim(team_cd) = #{teamCd}
select * from wms_gdxd_in where trim(team_cd) is null
select mat_nm from wms_gdxd_in group by mat_nm

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_in w where (w.in_line = #{inLine} or #{inLine} is null) and (w.mat_nm = #{brand} or #{brand} is null) and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno >= #{rangeStart}

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_in w where (trim(team_cd) = #{teamCd} or #{teamCd} is null) and (w.mat_nm = #{brand} or #{brand} is null) and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno >= #{rangeStart}
select count(*) from wms_gdxd_in
select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_in w where wo_state = #{woState} and ROWNUM <= #{length}) alias
select mat_nm,count(batch_no) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_in where trim(team_cd) = #{classTeam} group by mat_nm
select mat_nm,sum(boxtotalnum) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_in where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy.mm') = #{month} GROUP by mat_nm
select mat_nm,sum(boxtotalnum) as boxtotalnum from wms_gdxd_in where to_char(wo_start_time,'yyyy') = #{year} GROUP by mat_nm

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_in w where (w.in_line = #{inLine} or #{inLine} is null) and (w.mat_nm = #{brand} or #{brand} is null) and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and (batch_no=#{batch} or #{batch} is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno >= #{rangeStart}

select alias.* from (select w.*,ROWNUM as rowno from wms_gdxd_in w where (trim(team_cd) = #{teamCd} or #{teamCd} is null) and (w.mat_nm = #{brand} or #{brand} is null) and w.wo_start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and w.wo_end_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and TO_DATE(#{endTime},'yyyy.MM.dd') and (batch_no=#{batch} or #{batch} is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) alias where alias.rowno >= #{rangeStart}
